decision_buckets.native-runtime-existing: Provider is already routed through a dedicated native runtime path in src/providers/mod.rs.
decision_buckets.promote-to-provider-specific-runtime: Provider currently relies on compatibility routing but is promoted for provider-specific runtime path due strategic importance or semantic drift risk.
decision_buckets.maintain-openai-compatible: Provider remains on OpenAI-compatible path; no native path required now, but compatibility tests/logging are mandatory.
decision_buckets.native-adapter-required: Provider requires dedicated adapter/runtime implementation before considered complete.
decision_buckets.deferred-with-rationale: Provider is intentionally deferred with explicit rationale and must be tracked by follow-up beads.
decision_buckets.alias-forwarder: Alias ID should continue forwarding to canonical provider; no independent runtime path.

entries.compatibility_notes: OpenAI-like wire format is available; risk remains for provider-specific stream chunking, tool-call envelopes, and error taxonomy drift.
rationale: Marked high-priority by current provider-gap objective and user demand signal.
Current Pi support is via alias mapping to canonical provider; canonical path must remain deterministic.
Alias should not fork behavior; keep single canonical runtime path and coverage.
